bridge-type.label: MCD Bridge
bridge-type.description: C&S Managing Care Digital (MCD) account that is used to send data.

thing-type.label: MCD Sensor Thing
thing-type.description: Sends data for one mcdSensor to MCD, the C&S cloud application.

parameter.name: serialNumber
parameter.label: Serial number
parameter.description: Please enter the serial number of the sensor you want to create. It must match the serial number of this sensor in MCD.

channel-type.label: Login Status
channel-type.description: Shows whether a user is successfully logged in or not.

channel-type.label: Last Value
channel-type.description: Shows time and value of the last sensor event (readonly).

channel-type.label: Lying
channel-type.description: Send data for bed entry and bed exit.

channel-type.label: Fall
channel-type.description: Send a warning in case of a detected fall.

channel-type.label: Position Change
channel-type.description: Send event for a position change in bed.

channel-type.label: Empty battery
channel-type.description: Send warning for an empty battery.

channel-type.label: No activity

channel-type.label: Alarm
channel-type.description: Send alarm for any type of sensor, if no specific channel is suitable.

channel-type.label: Open/shut
channel-type.description: Send event when windows or doors are being opened or shut.

channel-type.label: Light
channel-type.description: Send an event when the light state changes.

channel-type.label: Activity
channel-type.description: Send an event for any kind of activity.

channel-type.label: Urine
channel-type.description: Send data from incontinence related sensors.

channel-type.label: Gas
channel-type.description: Send an event for gas.

channel-type.label: Presence in room
channel-type.description: Send data for room entry and room exit.

channel-type.label: Removed sensor
channel-type.description: Send warning for a removed sensor.

channel-type.label: Sitting

channel-type.label: Inactivity room

channel-type.label: Smoke alarm
channel-type.description: Send an alarm in case of smoke detection.

channel-type.label: Smoke
